game.name: Fireboy & Watergirl 5: Elements
game.description:
The fifth instalment of the highly recognized and widely played puzzle game series named Fireboy & Watergirl 5: Elements comes up with new and exciting challenges and puzzles. Do you think that you are ready enough to enter the deadly and enigmatic temples again? Remember you have to control both the character Fireboy and Watergirl in this brand new adventure game. They need your support in escaping from temples that are full of maze-like levels and dangerous traps. Many difficult challenges like water puddles and lava pools are awaiting you. 
Your objective in this platform game is to help duo clear the hurdles and make a safe way towards their destination to complete each level. It looks difficult for both the characters to stay at a one place first. However, they keep all their differences at bay and come forward to support each other to accomplish the challenging missions. Use the skill of Fireboy to walk through the pools of lava! Guide his partner watergirl to support lavaboy if needed in this fun adventure html5 game!
There are elemental temples to explore and sort out a number of puzzles in this hot boys game. Do not forget to collect the diamonds and complete missions as fast as you can to beat the time as well! Join the adventure alone or with the support of your friend in FBWG5! Protect your characters against many unexpected dangers by wielding water the flames in this platformer game! Avoid mixing the elements while solving dual puzzles! Good luck to play more arcade puzzle games online for free on atmegame.com!

game.mobileControlKeys: TAP ON MIDDLE ICON TO CHANGE THE TURN OF FIREBOY AND GIRL, L-R ICONS TO MOVE AND JUMP
game.webControlKeys: W,A,D TO MOVE FIREGIRL, ARROWS TO MOVE FIREBOY
